title: Jude's Salvation
description: EdenI didn’t know I needed saving until I met him. Just how much would eventually reveal itself. For three years he’s stalked me. Lingering so close but not close enough for me not to see him. Not close enough for me to hear him. I don’t know if he had a moment’s lapse or if he planned it that night but the second I heard his sinfully delicious voice I was trapped. I was his, again.JudeI have vowed since I was eighteen to keep her safe. To keep her from the sick hands of a man that plans to take her from me forever. Lex will tell her she was always destined to be his, but he wasn’t counting on me.~~At first glance, everything in Eden Daniel’s life looks perfect. She lives in a beautiful home in Los Angeles with her loving parents and supportive sister Bethany. She is going to Harvard Law and is about to embark on a vacation to Europe with her three best friends. But in Eden's world nothing is what it appears to be. Jude Everett watches her, protects her from the fate she can't escape forever. When her master calls her home everything will fall away leaving the scars and sins of her past life to pierce through her illusion. Jude has vowed to fight for her, to kill for her. She is his only salvation but when she discovers he's one of them will she still want his protection?Book One of Two. Part Two, Eden's Weakness now available*Mature Content** Recommended for ages 17+ due to sexual situations and language
author: Nicole T. Smith
